rho_water_from_pressure_water¶

pycraf.atm.rho_water_from_pressure_water(temp, press_w)[source] [edit on github]¶

Water density according to ITU-R P.453-12.

Parameters
tempQuantity

Air temperature [K]

press_wQuantity

Water vapor partial pressure [hPa]

Returns
rho_wQuantity

Water vapor density [g / m**3]
